settings.title: Hey I'm Will, the founder of The Ideal Sunday
settings.text: Inspired by a walk in the woods one sunny December day, The Ideal Sunday exists as a place for everyone to find quality products that benefit their life, and prioritise our planet.

settings.title: Our mission is to share the joy of plants for happier homes and a healthier planet. We help you discover beautiful plants for your home and hand-deliver them directly to your door, in the most sustainable manner possible.
How We Began
settings.text:
Like a lot of us, for the last few years I've been trying my best to make more eco-friendly decisions to help save our planet. But I found it difficult to identify those small yet impactful changes I could make in my day-to-day life.

The Ideal Sunday was created with an appreciation of the environment. Together with a walk through the woods on a sunny December afternoon and a couple of glasses of wine with friends, I decided I wanted to create a space that makes it easy for people like me to live more sustainably. Somewhere to find products that make life simpler, easier and healthier for everyone, without it breaking the bank or adding hours to our already busy lives.

settings.title: Our Values
settings.text: Here at The Ideal Sunday, weâ€™re guided by two core values. They shape every decision we make, every product we sell and every interaction we have.

settings.title: Sustainability Efforts
settings.text: Since the very beginning, The Ideal Sunday has been dedicated to giving back by striving for a sustainable planet. That's why we plant a tree for every order.

settings.heading: Spend & Save:
settings.text: Get up to Â£20 off + Free delivery

settings.title: Brands you can trust
settings.text: We stand behind the products we sell - They are all ethically sourced and things we love to use ourselves.

settings.title: Supporting small business
settings.text: We are a small business and we value supporting other small UK businesses.

settings.title: Let's grow together
settings.text: Same day dispatch before 2PM, free delivery over Â£40 and no questions asked returns.

settings.title: How do you plant a tree for every order?
settings.text: We have proudly partnered with Ecologi to plant a tree for every order placed on our site. Ecologi then plant the trees through the Eden Reforestion Project.

settings.title: What packaging will you use for my delivery?
settings.text: We use a range of packaging to get your order safely to your door. This could come as either a Green Jiffy Bag (large envelope), or a variety of cardboard boxes. All of these are environmentally friendly and biodegradable. We then safely package the contents with recycled paper and seal it with aÂ solvent free packaging tape.

settings.title: How does the Spend & Save work?
settings.text:
We've tried to encourage larger, less frequent orders so we have a smaller carbon footprint through delivery services.

To reward shopping this way we have introduced Spend & Save, the more you spend the more you save!

Spend Â£75, Save Â£10
Spend Â£100, Save Â£15
Spend Â£150, Save Â£25

All with free UK delivery!

Spend & Save is available store wide, even on discounted products, but it can't be used in conjunction with any other discounts like promotion codes.

settings.title: What are Reward Points and how can I use them?
settings.text:
Once you've created an account with us you can start earning Reward Points on purchases and referrals. These points can be exchanged for discount codes that you can use at checkout.

To get you started, you will earn 100 points just for signing up and 50 points each for liking us on Instagram and Facebook.

For more information on Rewards Points click here.

settings.title: When will my order be dispatched?
settings.text: All orders placed before 2PM Mon-Fri will be dispatched that day. Orders placed after this time will be dispatched the next working day.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text:
We send UK orders using Royal Mail 1st Class which typically take 1 working day.

Please visit our Delivery & Returns page for more information.

settings.title: Do you deliver internationally?
settings.text: Yes, we are based in the UK but offer worldwide deliveries.

settings.title: I haven't received my order yet, where is it?
settings.text: If you haven't received your order and the allocated delivery time has passed then please feel free to email us at support@theidealsunday.comÂ so we can follow up on the progress for you.

settings.title: What happens if I receive the wrong item?
settings.text: In the unlikely event you receive the wrong item, please email us at info@theidealsunday.com so we can send the correct item to you and arrange a return for the item you receeived.

settings.title: How do I return an item?
settings.text: Whether you have received a faulty item or have simply changed your mind, we offer returns and refunds to suit your needs. Please let us know within 14 days fromÂ the date of dispatch by emailingÂ support@theidealsunday.comÂ so we can arrange this with you. Please refer to ourÂ Delivery & ReturnsÂ page for more details.
